title: Not Getting My Key Fragments on beta????
body: After games it says i earned keyfragments then i go and look and there isnt any please fix this ...and get me my key fragments! thx ..Zip56

replies.body: Thanks for response, I just earned another fragment  playing kennen on aram which led me to check back on forum,,, I Logged on Legacy and have no Key Fragments Aswell.

Do they show up if you swap over to the *Legacy Client* from the login screen?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know!
